title: Prologue, to the Duke of Guise written by Mr. Dryden ; spoken by Mr. Smith.
author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
notes: "Epilogue, written by the same authour ; spoken by Mrs. Cooke": p. [2-3]; and "Another epilogue intended to have been spoken to the play, before it was forbidden, last summer, written by Mr. Dryden": p. [3-4].
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
